description: New cup: Downhill Trials New looks: Cowboy Advanced team search Various bug fixes

name: SWORD ART ONLINE: Memory Defrag
description: Brave the virtual world with the heroes of Sword Art Online in one of Japan’s most popular anime role playing games, the brand-new action game.

description: For new features, look for in-product education & notifications sharing the feature and how to use it!

name: Candy Crush Saga
description: No description, you get it.

name: Assassin's Creed Rebellion
description: Transport your Heroes to Granada on a quest for revenge in the all-new Helix Rift Event, Kinslayer! Discover 5 new missions Explore local slums, a Templar manor, and the legendary Alhambra Recruit 2 new Heroes: Najma, the Granadan Avenger and Muza, the Moorish Warrior!

name: Sonic Dash
description: It's time to go fast all over again with improved stability and bug fixes!

name: Pokemon GO
description: Bug fixes, no other description but im sure you get it

name: Walking Dead: Road to Survival
description: Introducing, Walker Hordes! A brand new feature that puts you in control of the walking dead!

name: Need for Speed™ No Limits
description: Race for dominance in the first white-knuckle edition of Need for Speed made just for mobile – from the developer that brought you Real Racing 3. Build your dream ride with an unbelievable range of cars and customizations.

name: Fruit Ninja
description: Optimisation tweaks and minor enhancements.

name: Game of Thrones: Conquest™
description: The dead walk. The horns have sounded. Prepare for the Battle of Winterfell! Event monsters will soon be spawning across Westeros! Using the wisdom of the maesters, craft ancient relics to repel the dead.

description: Star wars, what else?

name: MARVEL Spider-Man Unlimited
description: NEW STORY Halt the Spider-Queen's return before she ushers in a reign of terror! NEW SPIDEYS KNULL, the Lord of the Abyss, is back to turn the tide of battle! SPIDER-GWEN (ERIN HASKO) is ready to steal the spotlight.

name: MORTAL KOMBAT
description: Grandmaster of the Lin Kuei clan, MK11 Sub-Zero arrives as the newest Diamond kard! MK11 Sub-Zero introduces new, soul-chilling moves like Breaking the Ice, Axe the Question, and his Fatal Blow from MK11!

name: TEKKEN™
description: New Halloween Events and Characters: Eliza and Halloween Dragunov enter the battle! Halloween customization items: go get your broom, ghost, etc. New deck builder: new layout to help you manage your decks like your runes.
